document.full_text: john demjanjuk's defense attorney demanded the 91-year-old accused of helping kill 27,900 jews in the holocaust be awarded damages for false imprisonment when final arguments in the high-profile trial began tuesday.
document.title: defense demands damages as demjanjuk trial concludes
lines_and_colors: john demjanjuk's defense attorney demanded the 91-year-old accused of helping kill 27,900 jews in the holocaust be awarded damages for false imprisonment when final arguments in the high-profile trial began tuesday.
